did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Minutes of the U.S Senate Republican Policy Committee,
1969-1974
did.physdesc: This collection consists of seven bound volumes.
did.origination: Edward L. Beach, Staff Director and Secretary compiled these items.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: U.S. Senate Republican Policy Committee, Minutes, 1969-1976, Accession #10200-af, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the Library by Edward L. Beach of Washington, D.C., on June 21, 1997.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains copies of the minutes of the Senate Republican Policy Committee meetings, 1969-1976, compiled and collected by Edward L. Beach, Staff Director and Secretary. Major political topics of the day are discussed as well as committee reports, appropriations, the legislative schedule (presented by Hugh Scott), and Republican campaigns.
